subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mustapha Farrakhan Jr., grandson of Louis Farrakhan, is good enough at either of the guard positions and at small forward to be recruited by a number of Division I programs.
snippet: Mustapha Farrakhan Jr., grandson of Louis Farrakhan, is good enough at either of the guard positions and at small forward to be recruited by a number of Division I programs.
